goal.ch: 本課程是歷史所研一生必修，目的在於幫助學生更進一步了解研究生生涯與未來可能的生涯、職涯出路，並提供學生多樣化的思考，幫助學生順利進入研究領域並正式展開學位論文之撰寫。本課程部拘泥於每週課堂上課的型式，希望讓學生在各種時間、多元形式的聽講、參訪等等，理解歷史學的多元風貌。老師就是導師，更能兼顧同學解決研究生生涯之問題，是一門充滿彈性與多元學習的課程。
goal.en: This course is compulsory for history graduate students throughout their life. Its purpose is to help students further understand the graduate career and possible future careers and career outlets, and to provide students with diversified thinking, to help students successfully enter the research field and formally start writing their dissertations. This course is limited to the type of weekly class, hoping to allow students to understand the diverse features of history at various times and in various forms of listening, visiting, etc. Teachers are mentors, and they can take care of students to solve problems in their postgraduate careers. It is a flexible and multi-learning course.

outline.ch:
本學期採取彈性時間微課程型式授課
一、過年後第二週，參與近代史研習營，共計18小時。
二、安排演講：
張隆志    博物館歷史學   2小時
民國史大師講座              2小時
三、國家檔案館參訪       2小時
四、講述田野調查與口述歷史的訪談方法  4小時
五、日記與歷史              2小時
六、期末報告                 2小時
共計32小時，以符合16週上課時數
outline.en:
This semester adopts flexible time micro-course teaching
1. In the second week after the Chinese New Year, participate in the modern history study camp, a total of 18 hours.
2. Arrange speeches:
Zhang Longzhi Museum History 2 hours
Master Lecture on History of the Republic of China 2 hours
3. Visit to the National Archives 2 hours
4. Interview methods for fieldwork and oral history 4 hours
5. Diary and history 2 hours
6. Final report 2 hours
32 hours in total to meet the 16-week class hours
